DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; AUSTRIA ; FORMER SYRIAN ENVOY IS ARRESTED
DOC.TEXT: Syria ' s former ambassador to East_Germany has been arrested on suspicion of helping to provide explosives to terrorist Carlos the Jackal , police said.The former diplomat was identified by the Austrian Press_Agency as Faisal Summak . He was arrested in a Vienna hotel on an international warrant . Police said the Syrian ambassador from 1981 to 1989 ordered an aide to supply 15 pounds of explosives to Carlos , who was captured in August and now awaits trial in Paris .
